name: Derived SS2018: Lacrimal Gland/Sac
title: Derived Summary Stage 2018: Lacrimal Gland/Sac
subtitle: Derived Summary Stage 2018
rows:
Localized only (localized, NOS)
- Confined to lacrimal gland
  + WITH or WITHOUT extraglandular extension into the orbital soft tissue
  + No periosteal or orbital bone involvement or UNKNOWN if involved

Regional by direct extension only
- Confined to lacrimal gland 
  + AND involvement of periosteum AND/OR periorbital bone

Regional lymph node(s) involved only
- Cervical, NOS
- Mandibular, NOS
  + Submandibular (submaxillary)
- Parotid, NOS
  + Infra-auricular
  + Preauricular
- Regional lymph node(s), NOS
  + Lymph node(s), NOS

Regional by BOTH direct extension AND regional lymph node(s) involved
- Codes (2) + (3)

Distant site(s)/lymph node(s) involved
- Distant site(s) (including further contiguous extension)
   + Adjacent structure(s), NOS
   + Brain
   + Cavernous sinus
   + Orbital bone
   + Periosteum
   + Pterygoid fossa 
   + Sinuses
   + Superior orbital fissure
   + Temporal fossa
- Distant lymph node(s), NOS
- Distant metastasis, NOS 
  + Carcinomatosis
  + Distant metastasis WITH or WITHOUT distant lymph node(s)
